resources.string: we just need you to confirm the information below and well the email you with link to a web page where you can upload all the documents we need to complete your claim and achieve a settlement as quickly as possible
We are sorry that your vehicle has been damaged.
To help us arrange a repair we need you to provide:
Before submitting your claim please check your terms and conditions to confirm the damage fits with in the size(cms) and limits described. These where supplied when you purchased the products.
Please tap to indicate the location of the damage
